Description.Details: X-Pulse Lasers were an attempt, started in 3055, by the Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of pulse lasers. An improvement upon standard Large Lasers, Large X-Pulse Lasers use pulses of light instead of a single beam. This results in better accuracy and damage output but with greatly increased heat and weight. Large X-Pulse Lasers are extremely accurate.

Modes.Name: Low Power Mode
Modes.Description: Using less Energy to create the Laser reduces heat generation at the cost of Damage.
